 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפַף‎</span>] **verb Po\`el** ==shake, rock== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְפַף‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***move gently***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***quiver, flash, throb***; also Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִפְרֵף‎</span> ***flutter***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flutter, flap wings***); — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַמּוּדֵי שָׁמַיִם יְרוֺפָ֑פוּ‎</span> [[Job.26.11|Job 26:11]].
